info.name: Battleship API
info.description: Colección completa para probar la API de Batalla Naval con flujos completos de admin y jugadores

item.name: 1. Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for admin and players

request.description: Register admin user for managing ship templates and base fleets
Register first player for testing game flow
Register second player for testing game flow
Login as admin to get access token
Login as player 1 to get access token
Login as player 2 to get access token
Get current authenticated user information

item.name: 2. Admin Endpoints
item.description: Admin endpoints for managing ship templates and base fleets

request.description: Create aircraft carrier template (size 5)
Create battleship template (size 4)
Create cruiser template (size 3)
Create submarine template (size 3)
Create destroyer template (size 2)
List all available ship templates
Get specific ship template by ID
Update ship template details
Delete ship template (NOTE: Recreate Destructor after this test)
Create standard fleet with 5 ships on 10x10 board
Create advanced fleet with 2 carriers on 15x15 board
List all available base fleets
Get specific base fleet by ID
Update base fleet details
Delete base fleet
Get available fleets for Player 1
Get available fleets for Player 2
Get all games for Player 1
Get all games for Player 2
Create new game for Player 1 with standard fleet
Place Portaaviones at A1-A5 horizontal
Place Acorazado at C1-C4 horizontal
Place Crucero at E1-G1 vertical
Place Submarino at H5-H7 horizontal
Place Destructor at J9-J10 vertical - Last ship
Get current board status with all ships
Shoot at A10 - should miss
Shoot at E1 - should hit Crucero
Continue hitting Crucero at F1
Final shot to sink Crucero at G1
Get all shots history for this game
Get game statistics
Delete game after testing

item.name: 4. Game - Player 2 Complete Flow
item.description: Complete game flow for Player 2 with different ship placements

request.description: Create new game for Player 2 with standard fleet
Place Portaaviones at B2-B6 horizontal
Place Acorazado at D5-G5 vertical
Place Crucero at F8-H8 horizontal
Place Submarino at I2-I4 horizontal
Place Destructor at A9-A10 horizontal - Last ship
Get current board status with all ships
Shoot at C1 - should miss
Shoot at D5 - should hit Acorazado
Continue hitting Acorazado at E5
Continue hitting Acorazado at F5
Final shot to sink Acorazado at G5
Get all shots history for this game
Get game statistics
Delete game after testing

item.name: 5. Testing & Edge Cases
item.description: Test edge cases and error handling

item.name: Try to shoot before placing ships

exec: pm.test("Error message about game not ready", () => {

request.description: Try to shoot before all ships are placed - should fail

item.name: Try to place ship out of bounds

exec: pm.test("Error message about out of bounds", () => {

request.description: Try to place 5-cell ship at A8 horizontal (goes beyond A10) - should fail

item.name: Place first ship for overlap test

request.description: Place Portaaviones at A1-A5 for overlap test
Try to place Acorazado overlapping with Portaaviones - should fail

item.name: Complete ship placement for duplicate shot test

exec: // Place remaining ships to complete setup

request.description: Place last ship to enable shooting
Shoot at B10 first time - should succeed

item.name: Try to shoot same coordinate twice

request.description: Try to shoot B10 again - should fail

item.name: Try player access to admin endpoints

request.description: Try to create ship template as player - should fail with 403

item.name: Try to access other player's game

request.description: Try to access Player 2's game with Player 1's token - should fail
Try to shoot at invalid coordinate Z99 - should fail

item.name: Try to create game with non-existent fleet

exec: pm.test("Error message about fleet not found", () => {

request.description: Try to create game with non-existent fleet ID - should fail
Clean up test game
